name: Fair is Foul
text: You curse the target with a disfiguring or painful mutation. The target gains one random deformity from the Arcane Malignancies table (see page 10). The curse bestowed by this spell cannot be dispelled but can be removed with a break enchantment, limited wish, miracle, remove curse, or wish spell.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料 (一颗蝾螈眼球)
text_zh: 你以毁容或疼痛的变异诅咒受术者。受术者从奥术恶性状态表格(Arcane Malignancies table，见本书P.10)获得一项随机的畸变。被此法术所赋予的诅咒无法被解除，但可以被破除结界(break enchantment)、有限祈愿术(limited wish)、神蹟术(miracle)、移除诅咒(remove curse,)或祈愿术(wish)所移除。
